TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartPersonalization extends System.Object

summary.span: 实现低级别个性化设置操作。

span.span: Implements low-level personalization operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现执行较低级别个性化设置操作所需的逻辑。This class implements the logic required to carry out lower-level personalization operations. 尽管类管理个性化高级生命周期，它是负责实际实现所必需执行特定的个性化设置操作的物理步骤的类。Although the class manages the high-level life cycle of personalization, it is the class that is responsible for actually implementing the physical steps necessary to carry out specific personalization actions. 类又依赖于实现与个性化设置信息的基础数据存储进行通信。The class in turn relies on an implementation of to communicate with the underlying data store for personalization information. 如果你使用的默认实现，它创建的实例可以通过引用使用的类属性。If you use the default implementation of the , it creates an instance of the class that you can use by referencing the property. 例如，若要访问属性，则会指定`WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`。For example, to access the property, you would specify `WebPartManager.Personalization.InitialScope`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类时，以及提供个性化设置作用域将如何影响个性化设置属性的结果的示例。The following code example shows how the class is used, as well as providing an example of how personalization scope affects the results of personalized properties. 此示例具有五个文件：This example has five files: - 一个.aspx 页面，以声明方式创建两个 Web 部件区域中，每个都有一个控件。An .aspx page that declaratively creates two Web Part zones, each with a control. - 用户控件调用`Color.ascx`，它允许用户更改应用基于用户的授权权限来修改状态信息以及进入共享的范围文本背景色的个性化设置的属性。A user control called `Color.ascx` that allows a user to change a personalized property that applies a text box background color based on the user's authorization rights to modify state information and to enter shared scope. - 用户控件调用`Persmode.ascx`，该值指示当前的页范围是且何种权限当前用户有输入共享的作用域或修改数据; 它还提供了两个按钮; 另一个用于更改作用域，另一个用于重置当前的用户个性化设置信息。A user control called `Persmode.ascx` that indicates what the current page scope is and what rights the current user has to enter shared scope or to modify data; it also provides two buttons; one to change scope and one to reset current user personalization information. - 一个用于授权用户的登录控件。A login control that is used to authorize users. - 具有一节提供了一种授权用户修改个性化设置状态并输入共享的范围的 Web.config 文件。A Web.config file with a section that provides an example of authorizing a user to modify personalization state and to enter shared scope. 下面的代码创建的 aspx 页和两个 Web 部件区域中并显示`Color.ascx`和`Persmode.ascx`控件。The following code creates an aspx page with a and two Web Part zones and displays the `Color.ascx` and `Persmode.ascx` controls. 用于获取当前的用户信息的登录页加载页面。The page loads a login page that is used to get the current user information. 使用 ASP.NET 网站管理工具中[!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]若要创建用户访问页。Use the ASP.NET Web Site Administration Tool in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)] to create users to access the page. 请参阅授予配置文件中的授权用户，可以更改作用域和修改状态信息的示例的 Web.config 文件。See the Web.config file for an example of a user granted authorization in the configuration file to change scope and modify state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/Defaultcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/Defaultvb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例创建一个登录页面。The following example code creates a login page. 成功登录后它重定向到主 aspx 页。After a successful login, it redirects to the main aspx page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/login.aspx#5)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/login.aspx#5)] 下面的示例代码是此应用程序的 Web.config 文件的一部分。The following example code is a portion of the Web.config file for this application. 本部分说明如何在这种情况下"user2"中设置的用户授权，输入共享个性化设置作用域以及如何修改个性化状态信息。This section shows how to set authorization for a user, in this case "user2", to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. 它还显示在此情况下"admin"，可用来允许用户在"管理员"角色中输入共享个性化设置范围和修改个性化设置状态信息的角色的一个示例。It also shows an example of a role, in this case "admin", that can be used to allow users in the "admin" role to enter shared personalization scope and to modify personalization state information. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/web.config#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/web.config#2)] 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，称为`Color.ascx`，，它允许用户更改的个性化设置的属性，在此情况下两个文本框中，根据当前的个性化设置范围和用户的授权权限的背景色.The following example code creates a user control, called `Color.ascx`, that allows the user to change a personalized property, in this case the background color of two text boxes, based on the current personalization scope and the authorization rights of the user. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/color.ascx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/color.ascx#3)] 下面的代码示例创建一个用户控件，称为`Persmode.ascx`、 显示当前的个性化设置范围和用户的权限修改状态和输入共享的作用域。The following example code creates a user control, called `Persmode.ascx`, that shows the current personalization scope and the user rights to modify state and to enter shared scope. 它还具有用于重置当前的个性化状态重置按钮。It also has a reset button for resetting the current personalization state. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#4)]

para.span: 与紧密合作类控制和个性化基础结构的其余部分。

span.span: The class works closely with a control and the rest of the personalization infrastructure.

para.span: 个性化设置的默认实现是应满足您的个性化需要十分可靠子系统。

span.span: The default implementation of personalization is a very robust subsystem that should meet your personalization needs.

para.span: 在大多数情况下，如果你想要自定义个性化设置，你可以创建的数据提供程序使用如个性化设置提供程序创建一个类继承自。

span.span: In most cases, if you want to customize personalization, you can create a data provider for use as a personalization provider by creating a class that inherits from .

para.span: 如果你想要创建个性化子系统明显不同于所提供的和类，应创建自定义由派生自实现并添加自己的自定义逻辑。

span.span: If you want to create a personalization subsystem significantly different from that provided by the and the classes, you should create a custom implementation by deriving from and add your own custom logic.

para.span: 然后创建自定义由派生自实现，添加您自己的自定义逻辑，并重写方法以返回您的自定义实现。

span.span: Then create a custom implementation by deriving from , add your own custom logic, and override the method to return your custom implementation.

para.span: 因为控制通过个性化基础结构向发出请求实例，控件不是直接与交互或保留对引用实现。

span.span: Because a control makes requests to the personalization infrastructure by way of a instance, the control does not directly interact with or hold references to implementations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化此类的实例，并将其与关联控件的名义个性化设置操作将执行实例。This constructor initializes an instance of this class and associates it with the control on whose behalf the instance will carry out personalization operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyPersonalizationState() cil managed

summary.span: 将个性化设置数据应用于父 控件。

span.span: Applies personalization data to the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，此方法调用方法实例将应用于提供的 Web 部件控件的个性化设置状态。If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

exception.span: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了应用个性化设置状态的尝试。

span.span: Applies personalization data to the specified control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将个性化数据应用于单个-派生类请求为此，则父级时控件。This method is called to apply personalization data to an individual -derived class when requested to do so by the parent control. 如果属性设置为`true`，此方法调用方法实例将应用于提供的 Web 部件控件的个性化设置状态。If the property is set to `true`, this method calls the method on the instance to apply personalization state to the supplied Web Parts control.

exception.span: 进行了将个性化设置状态应用于不受父 管理的 Web 部件控件的尝试。

public: property bool CanEnterSharedScope { bool get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示用户是否已授权可以进入 范围。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether the user is authorized to enter scope.

value.span: 如果用户已授权可以进入 范围，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to enter scope; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回`true`如果用户授权中输入作用域。This property returns `true` if the user is authorized in the to enter scope. 第一次调用该属性，它将确定用户的右输入作用域，缓存信息。The first time the property is called, it determines the user's right to enter scope and caches the information. 如果字典之后修改第一次此属性被调用时，更改不会显示在对此属性的后续调用。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not shown on subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分类的说明。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ChangeScope(valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope scope) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub ChangeScope (scope As PersonalizationScope)

param.name: scope
param.span: 当前页的新个性化设置范围。

span.span: The new personalization scope for the current page.

summary.span: 将当前页的 实例更改为指定的范围。

span.span: Changes the current page's instance to the scope specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由指定的新作用域更改当前正在执行页的个性化设置范围`newScope`参数。This method changes the currently executing page's personalization scope to the new scope specified by the `newScope` parameter. 此方法是调用由公共受保护的帮助器方法方法。This method is the protected helper method that is called by the public method. 此受保护的方法存在是为了处理未来的扩展性，如果有多个两个可能的作用域之间进行切换。This protected method exists to handle future extensibility if there are more than two possible scopes to switch between. 如果当前作用域和`newScope`都是相同的值，则此方法不执行任何操作。If the current scope and `newScope` are the same value, then this method performs no operation.

exception.span: 如果尝试从 范围切换到 范围，则当前用户不具有进入 范围的用户功能。

span.span: If attempting to switch from scope to scope, the current user does not have the user capability to enter scope.

exception.span: 不是 枚举的有效成员。

span.span: is not a valid member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void CopyPersonalizationState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartA, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartB);

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyPersonalizationState(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartA, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPartB) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub CopyPersonalizationState (webPartA As WebPart, webPartB As WebPart)
protected public: virtual void CopyPersonalizationState(System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartA, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::WebPart ^ webPartB);

param.name: webPartA
param.span: 提供个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control supplying the personalization data.

param.name: webPartB
param.span: 接收个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control receiving the personalization data.

summary.span: 从一个 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态，并将它应用于另一个 Web 部件控件。

span.span: Extracts the personalization state from one Web Parts control and applies it to a second Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法提取个性化状态从`webPartA`和将其应用于`webPartB`。This method extracts the personalization state from `webPartA` and applies it to `webPartB`. 此方法假定`webPartA`和`webPartB`具有相同的类型。This method assumes that `webPartA` and `webPartB` are the same type. 如果 Web 部件控件控件，则该方法会将个性化状态复制从包装中的子控件`webPartA`给子控件包装在`webPartB`。If the Web Parts controls are controls, the method copies the personalization state from the child control wrapped in `webPartA` to the child control wrapped in `webPartB`. 作为复制操作的一部分`webPartB`被标记为"脏"。As part of the copy operation, `webPartB` is marked as "dirty".

exception.span: 或 为 。

span.span: Either or is .

exception.span: 和 不是同一种 。

span.span: and are not of the same .
\- or -

exception.span: 和 是 控件，但其中一个（或两个都）缺少子控件。

span.span: and are controls but one or both lack a child control.
\- or -

exception.span: 和 是 控件，但它们的子控件不是同一种 。

span.span: and are controls, but their child controls are not of the same .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool Enabled { get; set; }
Public Overridable Property Enabled As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Enabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否请求启用关联 控件的个性化设置。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the associated control.

value.span: 如果启用个性化设置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否请求个性化若要启用父控件。This property indicates whether personalization is requested to be enabled for the parent control. 请注意，这是细微但重要的意图的区别和。Note that this is a subtle but important distinction from the intent of and . 此属性仅在完成之前设置控件的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在实践中，这意味着，属性必须在设置中的页标记元素是否应该禁用个性化设置。In practice, this means that the property must be set in the page markup on the element if personalization should be disabled. 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段控件。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 在完成关联 控件的 方法之后，进行了设置此属性值的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property value after the associated control's method had completed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void EnsureEnabled(bool ensureModifiable) cil managed

param.name: ensureModifiable
param.span: 布尔值，指示应进行哪种类型的检查。

span.span: A Boolean value indicating which type of check should be made.

summary.span: 确保 实例已完成初始化或当前用户具有修改个性化设置状态的权限。

span.span: Ensures that the instance has completed initialization or that the current user has rights to modify personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是帮助器方法，用于在几方法以确保两个操作之一：This method is a helper method used in several methods to ensure one of two things: - 实例已完成初始化 (例如，方法已调用并已成功完成)。The instance has completed initialization (for example, the method was called and successfully completed). 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`参数等于`false`。This check is made if the `ensureModifiable` parameter equals `false`. \- 或 -\- or - - 当前用户有权修改个性化设置状态。The current user has rights to modify personalization state. 如果进行此检查`ensureModifiable`等于`true`。This check is made if `ensureModifiable` equals `true`. 控件还会在许多情况下调用此方法：The control also calls this method in a number of cases: - 若要切换为正常以外的项目的显示模式。To switch the display mode to something other than normal. 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要添加，删除或移动 Web 部件控件。To add, delete, or move Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要连接，断开连接，并编辑 Web 部件控件。To connect, disconnect, and edit Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state. - 若要导出页上的 Web 部件控件。To export the Web Parts controls on a page. 实例必须已完成初始化。The instance must have completed initialization. - 若要导入 Web 部件控件。To import Web Parts controls. 当前用户必须具有的权限修改个性化设置状态。The current user must have rights to modify personalization state.

exception.span: 当前用户不具有修改个性化设置信息的权限，或其他检查失败。

span.span: The current user does not have rights to modify personalization information, or other checks failed.
\- or -

exception.span: 返回 。

span.span: returned .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly EnterSharedScopeUserCapability As WebPartUserCapability

summary.span: 表示进入 范围的用户授权的 实例。

span.span: Represents the instance of a user's authorization to enter scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 已将用户权限由字符串"enterSharedScope"表示在实例。The user right is represented by the string "enterSharedScope" in the instance.

summary.span: 从父 控件中提取个性化设置数据。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from the parent control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExtractPersonalizationState() cil managed

summary.span: 从父 控件中提取个性化设置数据。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，和个性化设置状态将不重置在页请求期间 (例如，当属性是`false`)，则此方法从父提取个性化数据期间控制其事件。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the parent control during its event. 此方法调用方法实例从父提取个性化设置状态控件。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the parent control.

exception.span: 在从基础数据存储区加载状态之前，进行了提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to extract personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
\- or -

exception.span: 尚未应用个性化设置状态。

span.span: Personalization state has not been applied yet.
\- or -

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void ExtractPersonalizationState (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void ExtractPersonalizationState(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 包含要提取的个性化设置数据的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control containing personalization data to be extracted.

summary.span: 当父 控件请求从 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置数据时，按照其请求执行。

span.span: Extracts personalization data from a Web Parts control when requested to do so by the parent control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，和个性化设置状态将不重置在页请求期间 (例如，当属性是`false`)，则此方法从 Web 部件控件提取个性化数据指定的`webPart`。If the property is set to `true`, and personalization state is not being reset during the page request (such as when the property is `false`), then this method extracts personalization data from the Web Parts control specified by `webPart`. 此方法调用方法实例从提供的 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态。This method calls the method on the instance to extract personalization state from the supplied Web Parts control.

exception.span: 进行了从不受父 管理的 Web 部件控件提取个性化设置状态的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to extract personalization state from a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

span.span: An attempt was made to extract personalization state prior to the state being loaded from the underlying data store.
\- or -

\- or -

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual string GetAuthorizationFilter (string webPartID);

Protected Friend Overridable Function GetAuthorizationFilter (webPartID As String) As String
protected public: virtual System::String ^ GetAuthorizationFilter(System::String ^ webPartID);

param.name: webPartID
param.span: 与要检索的筛选器关联的 Web 部件控件的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the Web Parts control associated with the filter to be retrieved.

summary.span: 检索与指定的 Web 部件控件关联的授权筛选器（如果有）。

span.span: Retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the specified Web Parts control.

returns.span: 指定的 Web 部件控件的授权筛选器。

span.span: The authorization filter for the specified Web Parts control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索的授权筛选器，如果任何，与标识的 Web 部件控件相关联`webPartID`。This method retrieves the authorization filter, if any, associated with the Web Parts control identified by `webPartID`. 序列化并由个性化设置的每个 Web 部件控件与`webPartID`参数。Each Web Parts control that is serialized and managed by personalization is associated with a `webPartID` parameter. 在运行时，页面控件可以筛选显示在页上通过确定是否授权每个 Web 部件控件的控件。At run time, a page's control can filter the controls displayed on a page by determining whether each Web Parts control is authorized. 此授权信息作为字符串中与每个 Web 部件控件关联的数据存储。This authorization information is stored as a string in the data associated with each Web Parts control.

exception.span: 在 为 的情况下，在页的生命周期中，过早地通过调用此方法进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter when is by calling this method too early in the page life cycle.
\- or -

exception.span: 进行了检索授权筛选器的尝试，但是尚未加载任何个性化设置状态。

span.span: An attempt was made to retrieve an authorization filter and no personalization state has been loaded.
\- or

exception.span: 从数据存储区返回的个性化设置状态为 。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable Property InitialScope As PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 获取或设置默认个性化设置范围。

span.span: Gets or sets the default personalization scope.

value.span: ，指示关联 的默认个性化设置范围。

span.span: The indicating the default personalization scope of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示应用于父的默认个性化设置范围以前了解适当的作用域没有的控件。This property represents the default personalization scope that should be used for the parent control in the absence of previous knowledge about the proper scope. 如果未显式设置此属性，则默认为返回作用域。If this property is not explicitly set, it defaults to returning scope. 此属性仅在完成之前设置控件的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 在实践中，这意味着必须在设置中的页标记元素。In practice, this means must be set in the page markup on the element. 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段控件。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase of the control.

exception.span: 在完成关联 控件的 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

span.span: An attempt was made to set this property to a value other than its current value after the associated control's method had completed.

exception.span: 尝试为不是 枚举成员的 设置一个值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set a value of that is not a member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsEnabled As Boolean
public: property bool IsEnabled { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果为当前的 实例启用了个性化设置且成功加载了个性化设置数据，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is enabled for the current instance and personalization data has successfully loaded; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 之前加载个性化数据，此属性始终返回`false`。Prior to loading personalization data, this property will always return `false`. 例如，此属性将返回`false`期间`PreInit`阶段。For example, this property will return `false` during the `PreInit` phase. 在关联的方法已成功完成 (在此期间调用方法)，然后返回此属性将`true`。After the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called), this property will then return `true`. 此属性是受保护的可公开访问别名属性。This property is a publicly accessible alias for the protected property.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property IsInitialized As Boolean
protected: property bool IsInitialized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否启用了个性化设置，以及是否为 类的这一实例成功加载了个性化设置数据。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization is enabled and has successfully loaded personalization data for this instance of the class.

value.span: 如果此实例的个性化设置已初始化，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if personalization is initialized for this instance; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果启用了个性化功能 (如果属性设置为`true`)，则实例被视为初始化后立即关联的方法已成功完成 （在此期间调用方法)。If the personalization feature is enabled (if the property is set to `true`), the instance is considered initialized immediately after the associated 's method has successfully completed (during which the method is called). 之前加载个性化数据，此属性始终返回`false`。Prior to loading personalization data, this property always returns `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsModifiable As Boolean
public: property bool IsModifiable { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前用户是否已授权可以修改状态信息。

value.span: 如果用户已授权可以修改状态信息，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is authorized to modify state information; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次调用此属性时，它将缓存的结果确定用户的权限才能修改个性化设置状态。The first time this property is called, it caches the result of determining the user’s right to modify personalization state. 如果调用此属性在首次后修改字典，更改不会反映在后续调用此属性。If the dictionary is modified after the first time this property is called, changes are not reflected in subsequent calls to this property. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用属性。The following code demonstrates using the property. 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分类的说明。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#6)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationScope Load() cil managed
Protected Overridable Function Load () As PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 初始化个性化设置。

span.span: Initializes personalization.
A instance for the parent .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是初始化代表父级的个性化设置数据的主入口点控件。This is the main entry point for initializing personalization information on behalf of the parent control. 在父过程中调用此方法控件的方法。This method is called during the parent control's method. 通常情况下，如果已对父禁用个性化控件，将永远不会调用此方法。Normally, if personalization has been disabled on the parent control, this method will never be called. 在此方法的过程中，将发生以下初始化：During the course of this method, the following initializations occur: - 对默认的个性化设置提供程序或自定义提供程序的引用所示页面标记或获取属性。A reference to either the default personalization provider, or the custom provider indicated in the page markup or the property, is obtained. - 调用该提供程序来确定用户功能 () 为当前正在执行的用户。The provider is called to determine the user capabilities () for the currently executing user. - 当前作用域用户/页/组合的个性化设置状态提供程序，从基础数据存储区加载 () 并存储在实例。The personalization state for the current page/user/scope combination is loaded from the underlying data store by the provider () and stored within the instance. - 当前页/用户/范围的个性化设置范围由提供程序 ()。The personalization scope for the current page/user/scope is determined by the provider (). 请注意，此决定的结果可能是不同的值属性。Note that the result of this determination might be different than the value of the property. 此方法返回的作用域值用作的值属性。The scope value returned from this method is used as the value for the property. > [!NOTE] > 由于个性化设置未启用的异常时才将发生直接调用方法。An exception due to personalization not being enabled will occur only if the method is called directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中，内部帮助程序方法实际上调用来执行负载，和此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果没有为页上启用个性化时。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the load, and this helper method silently returns if personalization has not been enabled for the page.

exception.span: 如果个性化设置未启用（ 等于 ），则调用此方法。

span.span: This method is called when personalization is not enabled ( equals ).
\- or -

exception.span: 关联的 的 属性值为 。

span.span: The value of the property for the associated is .
\- or -

exception.span: 控件的关联 实例的 属性的值是 。

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

exception.span: 页面标记或 属性中显式设置了一个提供程序，但未能找到该提供程序。

span.span: A provider was explicitly set in either the page markup or the property and the provider could not be found.
\- or -

exception.span: 包含个性化设置状态数据的对象为 。

span.span: The object containing the personalization state data is .

exception.span: 加载和反序列化数据时出现问题。

span.span: A problem occurred while loading and deserializing data.
\- or -

exception.span: 配置文件中的个性化设置提供程序的定义出现错误。

span.span: An error occurred in the definition of a personalization provider in the configuration file.

exception.span: 基础个性化设置提供程序未能初始化，原因是未能找到默认提供程序或在尝试初始化个性化设置提供程序时出错。

span.span: The underlying personalization providers failed to initialize because a default provider could not be found or because a failure occurred while attempting to initialize a personalization provider.

span.span: Gets or sets the provider name for personalization.

value.span: 个性化设置提供程序的名称。

span.span: The name of the personalization provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性返回为此属性页声明中设置的值。This property returns the value set for this property in the page declaration. 如果未设置此属性，它将返回。If this property was not set, it returns . 在这种情况下，页使用默认个性化设置提供程序配置文件中指定。In this case, the page uses the default personalization provider specified in the configuration file. 此属性仅在完成之前设置控件的方法。This property can only be set prior to the completion of the control's method. 这意味着属性必须在设置页声明中元素。This means the property must be set in the page declaration on the element. 或者，可以将此属性设置期间`PreInit`阶段。Alternatively, this property can be set during the `PreInit` phase.

exception.span: 在完成 控件的 方法之后，进行了将此属性设置为当前值以外的值的尝试。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ResetPersonalizationState() cil managed

summary.span: 在基础数据存储区中重置当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据。

span.span: Resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置为当前页、 范围和基础数据存储区中的用户的个性化数据。This method resets personalization data for the current page, scope, and user in the underlying data store. 重置的副作用，当前正在执行的页重新执行通过调用。As a side effect of the reset, the currently executing page is re-executed by a call. 请注意，此传输重新执行当前页作为`GET`请求，而与该页最初请求的方式无关。Note that this transfer re-executes the current page as a `GET` request regardless of how the page was originally requested. 可以在任何时候调用此方法。This method can be called at any time. 此方法在内部调用上的提供程序的方法。Internally, this method calls the method on the provider. 已成功重置数据后，属性设置为`true`。After data is successfully reset, the property is set to `true`. 使用此属性是其他地方要跳过从控件属性的解压个性化数据实例并将其保存，如果数据已重置。This property is used elsewhere by the instance to bypass extracting personalization data from control properties and saving it if data has already been reset.

exception.span: 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save() cil managed

summary.span: 将当前的页、范围和用户的个性化设置数据保存到基础数据存储区。

span.span: Saves personalization data for the current page, scope, and user to the underlying data store.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法调用期间控件的事件。This method is called during the control's event. 在内部，该方法调用上的提供程序的方法。Internally, the method calls the method on the provider. 在尝试保存个性化数据，如果当前正在执行的用户不具有调用的功能(在当前实例) 会导致异常。Attempting to save personalization data when the currently executing user does not have the capability called (within the current instance) results in an exception. 请注意，这将仅是 true 如果控件调用受保护直接的方法。Note that this would only be true if the control called the protected method directly. 在 ASP.NET 实现中，内部帮助程序方法实际上调用来执行保存，和此帮助器方法以无提示方式返回如果当前正在执行的用户没有权限，无法修改数据。In the ASP.NET implementation, an internal helper method is actually called to perform the save, and this helper method silently returns if the currently executing user does not have rights to modify data.

exception.span: 当前的用户不具有称为 的功能。

span.span: The current user does not have the capability called .
\- or -

exception.span: 实例无法引用有效的个性化设置提供程序。

span.span: The instance cannot reference a valid personalization provider.
\- or -

exception.span: 当前没有任何个性化设置提供程序与 实例相关联。

span.span: No personalization provider is currently associated with the instance.

exception.span: 如果在调用 之前调用此方法，则可能发生这种情况（个性化设置提供程序引用是在调用 期间获取的。

span.span: This can occur if this method is called prior to calling (the personalization provider reference is obtained during the call to .
\- or -

exception.span: 尚未加载任何个性化设置状态。

span.span: No personalization state has been loaded.
\- or -

exception.span: 关联的 的 实例为 。

span.span: The instance for the associated is .
\- or -

span.span: The value of the property on the control's associated instance is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Scope As PersonalizationScope

summary.span: 获取父 控件的当前个性化设置范围。

span.span: Gets the current personalization scope for the parent control.
A instance indicating the scope of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值最初设置基于从返回的值上方法。This value is initially set based on the value returned from the method. 可以修改此值，通过调用方法。This value can be modified by calling the method. 请注意，此令牌表示用于应用和提取个性化设置信息的作用域。Note that this represents the scope used for applying and extracting personalization information. 此属性的值可能会与不同属性或方法。The value of this property might differ from the property or the method.

summary.span: 将父 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 将父 控件标记为具有已更改的个性化数据（即“脏数据”）。

span.span: Marks the parent control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，此方法将标记父控件用作"脏"。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the parent control as "dirty". 具体取决于的实现详细信息控件的实例，此方法可能调用安全检查和代码访问安全性权限检查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method might invoke security checks and code access security permission checks. 此方法在内部调用方法。Internally, this method calls the method. 请注意，控件内部跟踪"脏"的状态，并将公开通过管理器的"更新"属性而不是通过此方法。Note that the control tracks "dirty" state internally and exposes the "dirtiness" of the manager through the property rather than through this method.

exception.span: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void SetDirty (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart);

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要标记为“更新”的 Web 部件控件。

span.span: The Web Parts control to be marked "dirty".

summary.span: 将指定的 Web 部件控件标记为具有已更改（即“更新”）的个性化设置数据。

span.span: Marks the specified Web Parts control as having personalization data that has changed (is "dirty").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，此方法将标记为"脏"指定的 Web 部件控件。If the property is set to `true`, this method marks the specified Web Parts control as "dirty". 具体取决于的实现详细信息控件的实例，此方法可能调用安全检查和代码访问安全性权限检查。Depending on the implementation details of the control's instance of , this method may invoke security checks and code access security permission checks.

exception.span: 进行了将不受父 管理的 Web 部件控件标记为“更新”的尝试。

span.span: Attempted to mark as "dirty" a Web Parts control that is not managed by the parent .

exception.span: 尚未加载任何个性化设置数据。

span.span: No personalization data has been loaded.

MemberSignature.Value: protected: property bool ShouldResetPersonalizationState { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当前页的个性化设置数据是否已重置（例如，已请求从基础数据存储区删除个性化设置数据）。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the personalization data of the current page has been reset (for example, a request was made to delete the personalization data from the underlying data store).

value.span: 如果当前页的个性化设置状态已重置，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the personalization state for the current page has been reset; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性设置为`true`，它表示已重置当前页的个性化设置状态，提取的个性化数据从控件和后续保存操作应跳过。If this property is set to `true`, it indicates that the personalization state for the current page has been reset and that extraction of personalization data from controls and subsequent save operations should be skipped. 目前，此属性自动设置为`true`个性化基础结构如果调用方法。Currently, this property is automatically set to `true` by the personalization infrastructure if the method is called. 请注意，虽然有时可以设置此属性没有限制，但该属性必须设置为`true`之前控件的事件以产生任何影响。Note that although there are no restrictions on when this property can be set, the property must be set to `true` prior to the control's event to have any effect.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ToggleScope() cil managed

summary.span: 将当前页的个性化设置范围从 切换到 ，或从 切换到 。

span.span: Switches the current page's personalization scope from to or from to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法切换当前正在执行页的个性化设置范围。This method toggles the currently executing page's personalization scope. 切换范围导致回当前正在执行的页。Toggling the scope results in a back to the current executing page. 如果发生的 Web 部件控件的导入或导出时调用，此方法会执行任何操作。This method performs no operation if it is called while an export or import of a Web Parts control is occurring. 如果切换范围请求则会发生页通过提交`POST`请求，则任何查询字符串值将保留在传输过程; 如果已通过提交页面，不会保留查询字符串参数`GET`请求。If a toggle scope request occurs for a page that was submitted via a `POST` request, then any query string values will be preserved during the transfer; query string parameters are not preserved if the page was submitted via a `GET` request. ## Examples 下面的代码演示如何使用方法。The following code demonstrates using the method. 此代码是在中找到一个更大的代码示例的一部分类的说明。This code is part of a larger code sample found in the class description. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/CS/persMode.ascx#7)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartPersonalization#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartPersonalization/VB/persMode.ascx#7)]

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overridable ReadOnly Property UserCapabilities As IDictionary
protected: virtual property System::Collections::IDictionary ^ UserCapabilities { System::Collections::IDictionary ^ get(); };

summary.span: 从授予当前用户的 获取用户功能集。

span.span: Gets the set of user capabilities from granted to the current user.

value.span: 包含授予当前用户的一组用户功能的 ，如果用户为匿名用户，则为空的 。

span.span: An containing the set of user capabilities granted to the current user, or an empty if the user is anonymous.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前类包含两个值，该值指示用户的功能：`modifyState`和`enterSharedScope`。Currently the class contains two values indicating a user's capabilities: `modifyState` and `enterSharedScope`. 为了便于使用，可以使用帮助器属性检查字典中包含的功能和。For ease of use, the capabilities contained within the dictionary can be checked with the helper properties and . 请注意对访问其中任何一个属性; 后更改功能的限制有关详细信息，请参阅每个属性的描述部分。Note the restrictions on changing capabilities after either of these properties have been accessed; for details, see the description section of each property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定与此实例的关联控件类。Use this property to determine the control associated with this instance of the class.
